Description: You go into a rampage, doing several attacks without control for three rounds. This move automatically hits for dragon damage. In the first round, the damage es 1 die + MOVE modifier, in the second round, the damage es 2 dice + MOVE modifier and in the third round, the damage is 3 dice + MOVE modifier. When this move ends, either after the third round or from breaking concentration, you become confused. This attack stops if concentration is broken, or the user becomes incapacitated.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The dice used for this move changes to a d8 at level 5, a d10 at level 10, and a d12 at level 17.
